mapper.sql: bID, uID, uname, zname, sfz, khh, cardid, tjtime, statu
mapper.select:
select
from bankcard where 1=1
and uname like concat(concat('%',#{uname}),'%')
and zname like concat(concat('%',#{zname}),'%')
and STR_TO_DATE(tjtime,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{yyy},'%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{yyyy},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into bankcard (bID, uID, uname, zname, sfz, khh, cardid, tjtime, statu) values (#{bID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{khh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tjtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statu,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into bankcard
bID,
uID,

mapper.update:
update bankcard
uID = #{uID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zname = #{zname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sfz = #{sfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
khh = #{khh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardid = #{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tjtime = #{tjtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
statu = #{statu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where bID = #{bID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bankcard set uID = #{uID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zname = #{zname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfz = #{sfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, khh = #{khh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardid = #{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tjtime = #{tjtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, statu = #{statu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where bID = #{bID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
